# ktask

```text
usage: ktask [-h] [task_name]

```

Displays information about kernel tasks.
### Positional arguments

|Positional Argument|Help|
| :--- | :--- |
|task_name|A task name to search for|

### Optional arguments

|Short|Long|Help|
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
|-h|--help|show this help message and exit|
